member.name: CachedBitmap.CachedBitmap
member.summary: Creates a CachedBitmap.CachedBitmap object based on a Bitmap object and a Graphics object. The cached bitmap takes the pixel data from the Bitmap object and stores it in a format that is optimized for the display device associated with the Graphics object.
member.param: Pointer to a Bitmap object that contains the pixel data to be optimized.
Pointer to a Graphics object that is associated with a display device for which the image will be optimized.

member.name: CachedBitmap.CachedBitmap
member.param: The object to copy into this object.

member.name: CachedBitmap.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The CachedBitmap.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates whether thisCachedBitmap object was constructed successfully.

returns.para: If thisCachedBitmap object was constructed successfully, theCachedBitmap.GetLastStatus method returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If thisCachedBitmap object was not constructed successfully, the CachedBitmap.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the nature of the failure.
